trans-unit.source: Represents a control that can cycle through a set of states and maintain a state once set.
trans-unit.target: 表示可通过一组状态循环，并设置后保持状态的控件。

trans-unit.source: Gets the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取已缓存[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]参数的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: Cached property values must have been previously requested using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 缓存的属性值必须已以前请求过使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A> to get the current value of a property.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A>来获取属性的当前值。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Current%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the cached [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 一个包含已缓存的结构[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的控件模式的属性值。

trans-unit.source: The requested property is not in the cache.
trans-unit.target: 请求的属性不在缓存中。

trans-unit.source: Gets the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for this <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 获取当前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]参数的属性值<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: This pattern must be from an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> with an <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> reference in order to get current values.
trans-unit.target: 此模式必须从<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>与<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>以获取当前值的引用。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: If the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> was obtained using <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>, it contains only cached data, and attempting to get the current value of any property raises an exception.
trans-unit.target: 如果<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>获得使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode>，它只包含已缓存数据，并尝试获取的任何属性的当前值引发异常。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElementMode> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: Use <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A> to get the cached value of a property that was previously specified using a <xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>.
trans-unit.target: 使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A>若要获取的缓存的值指定的属性，这是以前使用一种<xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.CacheRequest> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.Cached%2A>

trans-unit.source: For information on the properties available and their use, see <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>.
trans-unit.target: 有关可用的属性和其使用的信息，请参阅<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation>

trans-unit.source: A structure containing the current [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)] property values for the control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 结构，它包含当前[!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_uiautomation](~/add/includes/tla2sharptla-uiautomation-md.md)]的控件模式的属性值。

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref> control pattern.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern"></xref>控件模式。

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: The pattern identifier is passed to methods such as <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A> to retrieve the control pattern of interest from the specified <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.
trans-unit.target: 模式标识符传递给方法，例如，<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>若要检索从指定的<xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>感兴趣的控件模式</xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement.GetCurrentPattern%2A>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。

trans-unit.source: Cycles through the toggle states of an <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: 循环浏览的切换状态<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement"> </xref>。

trans-unit.source: A control will cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: 控件将循环浏览其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>按以下顺序: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>、<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>和，如果支持， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState*>property.
trans-unit.target: 标识<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState*>属性。</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePattern.TogglePatternInformation.ToggleState*>

trans-unit.source: This identifier is used by UI Automation client applications.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化客户端应用程序使用此标识符。

trans-unit.source: UI Automation providers should use the equivalent field in <xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.
trans-unit.target: UI 自动化提供程序应使用<xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.TogglePatternIdentifiers>中的等效字段

trans-unit.source: An <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement> must cycle through its <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> in this order: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> and, if supported, <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>必须遍历其<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>按以下顺序: <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>、<xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>和，如果支持， <xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState>.</xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.ToggleState> </xref:System.Windows.Automation.AutomationElement>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: 要添加。
